attributes.action: Formally apologise to the Queen and Country for the behaviour of MPs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I demand that the Prime Minister make a formal apology in parliament, to be broadcast on national radio and television for the behaviour of MPs in respect of their claims for expenses. Not all MPs have abused the system but even those who have not must have known what was happening in their name.

Our soldiers signed up to serve their Queen and Country, to defend their Queen and Country. Many have been injured and some have lost their lives. This is the Queen's parliament, we are all subjects of the Queen. Parliament is now held in total disrepute, the Prime Minister must apologise.

rejection.details: The Prime Minister has already made an apology on behalf of all MPs. http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19258
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
